content: "http://www.rasmussenreports.com/public_content/politics/obama_administration/daily_presidential_tracking_poll" The Rasmussen Reports daily Presidential Tracking Poll for Tuesday shows that 36% of the nation's voters now Strongly Approve of the way that Barack Obama is performing his role as President. Thirty-two percent (32%) Strongly Disapprove giving Obama a Presidential Approval Index rating of +4 (see trends). The Presidential Approval Index is calculated by subtracting the number who Strongly Disapprove from the number who Strongly Approve. It is updated daily at 9:30 a.m. Eastern (sign up for free daily e-mail update). Updates also available on Twitter. "http://www.rasmussenreports.com/scoreboards/by_the_numbers2/by_the_numbers" Trends: "http://www.rasmussenreports.com/public_content/politics/obama_administration/obama_approval_index_history" "A government big enough to give you everything you want, is strong enough to take everything you have." ~ Gerald Ford

title: Polls show Obama at all time low of +4 approval index
